Name: Crystal Sanchez-Reyes
Description:
Crystal was shot six times at point blank range by Daniel Montenegro Delgado after she danced with his brother, Loreno Montenegro.

Delgado was convicted of second-degree murder and sentenced to 17 years in prison.
